ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: At 01:21 PM 7/2/99 -0500, you wrote: Until you get an overpull. ... -- Silverlock,  ICQ 474725 Household Pests?  The SW-404 SpitFire APRL cleansing system
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:21 PM 7/2/99 -0500, you wrote:

Until you get an overpull.

>From: Dan Alexander <dalex@...>
>
>At 01:29 PM 07/02/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>>>>>
>You really don't get it that Wizard's are group only. Certain classes can
>solo but after level 25 no matter what class you play even necro it becomes
>inefficent to solo. My friend is a level 40 Wizard and he can deal damage
>just fine. A Wizzard and a Warrior are perfect for each other all you need
>is a Cleric and your set. I just think you really missed the point of the
>Wizard Class.
>
><<<<
>
>Last nights party consisted of a cleric, a druid, and four wizards. The
>average Red lasted about 7 seconds, the Yellows lasted less than 5 - it
>looked like nighttime over Baghdad out there. A caster-heavy party rocks! =)
>
>-Pennaggolan
>
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>Find people who care about what you care about.
>http://www.onelist.com
>At ONElist: your connection to community.
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>http://www.tip.it/wizard
>
>
--
Silverlock, ICQ 474725

Household Pests? The SW-404 'SpitFire' APRL cleansing system
